ReturnOrderItemAdjustment.name: ReturnOrderItemAdjustment
ReturnOrderItemAdjustment.description: Represents a price adjustment on a return order line item.

Amount.description: Amount, not including tax, of the adjustment.

OrderItemAdjustLineSummaryId.description: ID of the order item adjustment line summary associated with the adjustment.

ReturnOrderId.description: ID of the return order associated with the return order line item to which the adjustment applies.

ReturnOrderItemAdjustmentNumber.description: ID of the return order item adjustment.

ReturnOrderLineItemId.description: ID of the return order line item to which this adjustment applies.

TotalAmtWithTax.description: Total amount of the adjustment, inclusive of tax. This amount is equal to Amount + TotalTaxAmount.
